attributes.action: send HM to a visit in Israel
attributes.background:
Since the end of the British Mandate (70 years ago) there has not be'n made an official visit of the royal family in Israel.
the only tow times that thear was a visits was for the Funeral of Rabin and Peres, And two visits were the Prince and not the Queen.

rejection.details: This petition calls on Her Majesty the Queen, and not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
